Name: Mogic
About the game: You are going to join the army of Captain L and collect gold with him. All you have to do in this game are controll the spaceship and +1s!!! Features · Explore space with exciting music · Parkour game · Spaceship and money!!!! · a lot achievement and trading card coming · Thousand of gold coin waiting for you
